setattribute.xpath: //item[@name='foodRawMeat' or @name='foodRottingFlesh' or @name='foodEgg' or @name='foodCornMeal' or starts-with(@name, 'foodCrop') or starts-with(@name, 'foodCan')]/property[@name='Stacknumber']
setattribute.name: value

remove.xpath: //item[(contains(@name, 'ammo') and not(contains(@name, 'Vomit')) or (starts-with(@name, 'gun') and not(contains(@name, 'Admin'))) or starts-with(@name, 'thrown'))]/effect_group/passive_effect[@name='BlockDamage']

setattribute.xpath: items/item[starts-with(@name, 'gun') and not(contains(@name, 'Schematic')) and not(contains(@name, 'Bot')) and not(contains(@name, 'Pipe')) and not(contains(@name, 'Primitive')) and not(contains(@name, 'Parts'))]/property[@name='UnlockedBy']
setattribute.name: value

setattribute.xpath: items/item[contains(@name, 'Wpn') and not(contains(@name, 'Schematic')) and not(contains(@name, 'Parts')) and not(contains(@name, 'T0'))]/property[@name='UnlockedBy']
setattribute.name: value

append.xpath: //item[(contains(@name, 'gun') or contains(@name, 'meleeWpn')) and contains(@name, 'T3') and contains(@name, 'Schematic')]
/items/item[(contains(@name, 'gun') or contains(@name, 'meleeWpn')) and contains(@name, 'Parts') and not(contains(@name, 'Robotics'))]

setattribute.xpath: //item[(contains(@name, 'gun') or contains(@name, 'meleeWpn')) and (contains(@name, 'T1') or contains(@name, 'T2') or contains(@name, 'T3')) and not(contains(@name, 'Parts')) and not(contains(@name, 'Robotics')) and not(contains(@name, 'Tool'))]/property[@name='RepairTools']
setattribute.name: value

setattribute.xpath: //item[(contains(@name, 'gun') or contains(@name, 'meleeWpn')) and (contains(@name, 'T1') or contains(@name, 'T2') or contains(@name, 'T3')) and not(contains(@name, 'Parts')) and not(contains(@name, 'Robotics')) and not(contains(@name, 'Tool')) and not(contains(@name,'T1BaseballBat'))and not(contains(@name,'T1HuntingKnife')) and not(contains(@name,'T1IronKnuckles'))and not(contains(@name,'T1IronSledge'))and not(contains(@name,'T1IronSpear'))]/property[@name='Material']
setattribute.name: value

append.xpath: //item[(contains(@name, 'gun') or contains(@name, 'meleeWpn')) and (contains(@name, 'T1') or contains(@name, 'T2') or contains(@name, 'T3')) and not(contains(@name, 'Parts')) and not(contains(@name, 'Robotics')) and not(contains(@name, 'Tool')) and not(contains(@name,'T1BaseballBat')) and not(contains(@name,'T1HuntingKnife')) and not(contains(@name,'T1IronKnuckles')) and not(contains(@name,'T1IronSledge')) and not(contains(@name,'T1IronSpear'))]

setattribute.xpath: //item[(contains(@name, 'gun') or contains(@name, 'meleeWpn')) and (contains(@name, 'T1') or contains(@name, 'T2') or contains(@name, 'T3')) and not(contains(@name, 'Parts')) and not(contains(@name, 'Robotics')) and not(contains(@name, 'Tool')) and not(contains(@name,'T1BaseballBat'))and not(contains(@name,'T1HuntingKnife')) and not(contains(@name,'T1IronKnuckles'))and not(contains(@name,'T1IronSledge'))and not(contains(@name,'T1IronSpear'))]/property[@name='Weight']
setattribute.name: value

setattribute.xpath: //item[(contains(@name, 'gun') or contains(@name, 'meleeWpn')) and (contains(@name, 'T1') or contains(@name, 'T2') or contains(@name, 'T3')) and contains(@name, 'Parts') and not(contains(@name, 'Robotics')) and not(contains(@name, 'Tool'))]/property[@name='Material']
setattribute.name: value

append.xpath: //item[(contains(@name, 'gun') or contains(@name, 'meleeWpn')) and (contains(@name, 'T1') or contains(@name, 'T2') or contains(@name, 'T3')) and contains(@name, 'Parts') and not(contains(@name, 'Robotics')) and not(contains(@name, 'Tool'))]

//item[(contains(@name,'meleeWpn') or contains(@name,'gun')) and not(contains(@name,'Nailgun')) and not(contains(@name,'Parts')) and not(contains(@name,'T0')) and not(contains(@name,'Bot')) and not(contains(@name,'BaseballBat')) and not(contains(@name,'Turret')) and not(contains(@name,'Schematic')) and not(contains(@name, 'book'))]

//item[contains(@name,'meleeTool') and (contains(@name,'T2') or contains(@name,'T3')) and not(contains(@name,'Nailgun')) and not(contains(@name,'Parts')) and not(contains(@name,'Schematic')) and not(contains(@name, 'book'))]

setattribute.xpath: //item[@name='foodSteakAndPotato' or @name='foodBlueberryPie' or @name='foodRosysCrunchyAcornPieITAV' or @name='foodPumpkinPie' or @name='foodPumpkinBread' or @name='foodShamChowder' or @name='foodFishTacos' or @name='foodChiliDog' or @name='foodShepardsPie' or @name='foodSpaghetti' or @name='foodTunaFishGravyToast']/property[@name='DisplayType']
setattribute.name: value

append.xpath: //item[@name='foodSteakAndPotato' or @name='foodBlueberryPie' or @name='foodRosysCrunchyAcornPieITAV' or @name='foodMeatStew' or @name='foodVegetableStew' or @name='foodPumpkinPie' or @name='foodPumpkinBread']

//item[@name='foodSteakAndPotato' or @name='foodBlueberryPie' or @name='foodRosysCrunchyAcornPieITAV' or @name='foodMeatStew' or @name='foodVegetableStew' or @name='foodPumpkinPie' or @name='foodPumpkinBread']/effect_group

setattribute.xpath: //item[contains(@name, 'T0') and not(contains(@name, 'Flashlight')) and not(contains(@name, 'pipe')) and not(contains(@name, 'quest')) and not(contains(@name, 'leather'))]/property[@name='SellableToTrader']
setattribute.name: value
